Name: HERADÔNIA Director's cut
About the game: 'HERADÕNIA' is a first-person psychological horror game, FOCUSED ON STORY. Play as Julia, a simple woman who lives in Heradônia, with her husband who works in the city police department and their daughter Ana. One day after returning from work, she realizes that her house is not the way it left it and her husband is not in town and her daughter has disappeared. On a certain day, Julia arrives home after a day at work and finds a note from her husband informing her that she had to make a last minute transfer to another state and would only return the next day and would not be able to pick Ana up from school. When Julia goes to pick up her daughter, she soon realizes that her daughter has disappeared. Explore, find items, notes and clues that led you to your daughter. Control a mother of a family with no combat skills. Use an iron bar to protect yourself from enemies.
